name: The Cursed Cave
description:
The Cursed Cave is a difficult rhythm game where the order of your inputs is reversed. Navigate through a deadly cave full of monsters and try to collect precious gems.

It's hard to wrap your mind around how the character moves at first, but it becomes more natural over time... it's still pretty hard in some levels though.

Listen to the awesome soundtrack here: https://soundcloud.com/r-e-v-e-r-b/sets/the-cursed-cave
